HEADER_OFFSET.details: This value reflects the header offset in the latest message version

MESSAGE_VERSION.details: This is only updated if the whole message structure is changed,      i.e. if a new part is added.      If already existing part is changed, the message version does not get bumped.

TWO_BYTES.details: How much bytes is used for storing the version, or a single offset value
